ui.description: UI primitives from packages/ui - reusable components, hooks, and utilities

web.description: Next.js web application - pages, app router, web-specific hooks and utilities

api.description: Unified backend API symbols - all routers, services, repositories, schemas, and cores (use apiLayers for targeted access)

shared.description: Shared utilities and types - currently mapped to web domain, will be separated in future

routers.description: API route handlers - FastAPI routers and HTTP endpoints with request/response handling

services.description: Business logic services - orchestration, validation, and domain operations

repositories.description: Data access layer - database queries, ORM operations, and RLS enforcement

schemas.description: Data Transfer Objects (DTOs) - Pydantic models for API serialization and validation

cores.description: Core utilities and foundations - auth, observability, middleware, error handling

metadata.author: MeatyPrompts Development Team
metadata.description: Symbol extraction configuration for MeatyPrompts monorepo. Supports domain-chunked symbols and layer-based API access for token-efficient codebase analysis.
